text: Some Boy! is a 1917 American silent comedy drama film directed by Otis Turner, and starring George Walsh, Doris Pawn, and Herschel Mayall.Solomon p.240 ==Cast== * George Walsh as Joyous Johnson * Doris Pawn as Marjorie Milbank * Herschel Mayall as William Johnson * Caroline Rankin as Arminta Simpkins * Hector V. Sarno as Count I. Boccacio * Velma Whitman as Dotty Donald * Norbert A. Myles as Ned Milbank ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography. McFarland, 2011. ==External links== * Category:1917 films Category:1917 comedy-drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American comedy-drama films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Otis Turner Category:Fox Film films Category:1917 comedy films Category:1917 drama films
title: Some Boy!
